document.heading: Disposition of District Land for Affordable Housing Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-193, the “Disposition of District Land for Affordable Housing Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-594. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 7, 2014, and Oct. 28, 2014, respectively. Returned without the Mayor’s signature on Nov. 27, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-485 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-193 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
